nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Stand Aside - Bounty Hunters!
The Clone Wars: Stand Aside - Bounty Hunters! is a young reader book by Simon Beecroft based on Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. The 32-page book was published in January 2010.
Follow the evil exploits of Cad Bane - villain of The Clone Wars - as he plots and schemes against the Jedi.

DK Readers combine fantastic illustrations and engaging, age-appropriate stories in a multi-level reading program guaranteed to capture a child's interest while developing reading skills and general knowledge. Stand Aside - Bounty Hunters by Heather Scott is a Level 2 book perfect for children beginning to read alone. It features longer sentences and increased vocabulary, as well as information boxes full of extra fun facts.
